body_content.explanation: to make a connection again between two or more people, things, or ideas, after a time when they were not connected:
examples: The scheme aims to relink citizens to their country.
We need to relink wages and productivity.

body_content.explanation: to connect two objects or places again physically:
examples: It took two years to relink the railway tracks.
I unhooked and re-linked the couplings.

body_content.explanation: to make a new connection with a website, social media post, video, etc. on the internet:
examples: I downloaded the new version from the internet and relinked the application to it.
I had to relink the tables to get the database to work.
